message.raw:
Improved test cases to handle segfault instance as well as more
thoroughly testing the non-context-manager case and the
open_chromosomes record keeping.
Supported single-file Genomedata archives, although this aspect will be
untested until the single-file archive creation is working.
Removed interal context manager uses of Genome, and simplified workings so
a call to Genome.close() is required unless Genome is used as a context manager.

message:
Improved test cases to handle segfault instance as well as more
thoroughly testing the non-context-manager case and the
open_chromosomes record keeping.
Supported single-file Genomedata archives, although this aspect will be

Removed interal context manager uses of Genome, and simplified workings so
